description.desc1: This node allows to load animation paths exported from blender.
description.desc2: The file is created inside Blender with the LedStrip-Exporter script.

playbar.descript: relative position on path. Best animated with QueScript

RenderGroup.descript: set the render group. Capture/Beamer/3DViewer have an equivalent in which you can choose which group to render.

closeSegment.descript: force closing the segement if it has a gap between the first and the last vertice

fileWatch.descript: reload animation path file if it was changes

Notes.note1: This node is definitly a work in progress...

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
